data = {'case_assert': '{"success":true}', 'case_code': 200.0, 'case_data': '{"code":"666666","phone":"13577777777","app_id":...pe":0,"token":"TOKEN","user_id":"USER_ID"}', 'case_headers': "{'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8'}", ...}

    @pytest.mark.parametrize('data', excel) #传入参数
    @allure.step('传入用例')    #设置用例步骤
    @allure.severity('blocker')     #设置用例严重级别为“中断缺陷”客户端程序无响应，无法执行下一步
    def test_gwyc_api(self,data):
        """
        调用接口
        :param data: 接口信息
        :return:
        """
        # for i in data:
        #     data = i
        #     return data
    
        allure.dynamic.story(data['case_module'])
        allure.dynamic.title(data['case_name'])
    
        # 对请求头做为空处理并添加token
        headers = data['case_headers']
        #将字符串转化为字典
        headers = ast.literal_eval(headers)
    
    
        # 对请求参数做为空处理
        params = data['case_data']
        if len(str(params).split()) == 0:
            pass
        elif len(str(params)) >= 0:
            params = params
    
    
    
    
    
        # 执行用例
        if data['case_method'] == 'get':
            r = ApiRequst().send_requests(
                method='get',
                url=data['case_url'],
                json=params,
                headers=headers
            )
            allure.attach("返回结果",'{0}'.format(r.json()))#在报告中显示返回结果
            assert int(r.json()['code']) == int(data['case_code'])   # 断言验证状态码
            a = assert_content(data['case_assert'], r.json())   # 验证响应数据
            allure.attach("验证响应数据，{0}".format(a))
    
    
        elif data['case_method'] == 'post':
            r = ApiRequst().send_requests(
                method='post',
                url=data['case_url'],
                json=ast.literal_eval(params),
                headers=headers
            )
    
            allure.attach("返回结果",'{0}'.format(r.json()))
            assert int(r.json()['code']) == int(data['case_code'])  # 验证状态码
            asserts = assert_content(data['case_assert'], r.json()) #调用断言验证方法
            allure.attach("验证响应数据，{0}".format(asserts))  # 在allure报告中显示验证响应数据
            if asserts == '断言结果成功':
                data['case_result'] = 'Pass'
                data['case_remarks'] = asserts
            else:
                data['case_result'] = 'Fail'
                data['case_remarks'] = asserts
>           reault = OperationExcel().write(data)
